message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount
I'll give you a higher amount this time, but you have to meet me in the middle
I'm not meeting you in the middle, I want a bit more
I'll meet you a bit more in the middle, but I'm still looking for a better deal
It's time to meet in the middle, let's call it a draw
You're right, let's call it a draw
